Package FX.Model.Entities.Ball

Class BallClone

java.lang.Object
FX.Model.Entities.Entities
FX.Model.Entities.Ball.Ball
FX.Model.Entities.Ball.BallClone
All Implemented Interfaces:
Movable
public class BallClone
extends Ball
this class is an addition which creates a clone ball to increase the game enjoyability.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    static double CLONE_BALL_GENERATION_PROBABILITY
    this is the probability where a clone ball is spawned.
    static int MAX_CLONE_BALL
    this is the maximum ball allowed to be cloned.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    BallClone​(javafx.geometry.Point2D center)
    this constructor is used to create a ball clone which is going to be used in the game.
